unnormalised: Arrey yaar, stats exam prep is killing me! Yesterday, I was trying to figure out the probability of drawing 2 red balls from a bag with 5 red, 3 blue, and 2 green ones. Solved it eventually, answer came to around 0.22, I think? But then, my didi asked me about the standard deviation of marks in her class - something like 65, 70, 75, 80, and 85. Suddenly felt like I was back in Class 8! Need chai break, then back to Bayes' theorem. Exam's on 20/11 and feeling completely lost.
normalised: Arrey yaar, statistics exam prep is killing me! Yesterday, I was trying to figure out the probability of drawing two red balls from a bag with five red, three blue, and two green ones. Solved it eventually, answer came to around zero point two two, I think? But then, my didi asked me about the standard deviation of marks in her class - something like sixty five, seventy, seventy five, eighty, and eighty five. Suddenly felt like I was back in Class eight! Need chai break, then back to Bayes' theorem. Exam's on twentieth November and feeling completely lost.
